mapper.select: SELECT num from experience order by num desc limit 1
select * from `experience` order by id desc limit 1
mapper.update: update experience set num = #{num}, password = #{password}, salt = #{salt}, name = #{name}, sex = #{sex}, phone = #{phone}, student = #{student}, school = #{school}, company = #{company}, graduateDate = #{graduateDate}, province = #{province}, seat_provid=#{seat_provid}, endtime = #{endtime}, noticeTime=#{noticeTime}, aid = #{aid}, flag = #{flag}, memo = #{memo}, summaryflag = #{summaryflag} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM experience WHERE num=#{num}
select salt from experience where num=#{num}
SELECT u.id from( select m.uid muid from experience e,member m where e.id=m.eid and e.id=#{id}) tablea,user u WHERE tablea.muid=u.id
SELECT count(u.id) from( select m.uid muid from experience e,member m where e.id=m.eid and e.id=#{id}) tablea,user u WHERE tablea.muid=u.id
select m.id from experience e,member m where e.id=m.eid and e.id=#{id}
select * from experience where num=#{num} and `password`=#{password}

SELECT e.id eid, num, password, e.salt esalt, e.`name` ename, sex, phone, student, school, company, graduateDate, province, seat_provid, begintime, endtime, noticeTime, flag, memo, qq, e.summaryflag esummaryflag, e.aid eaid, a.id aid, a.realname arealname FROM experience e LEFT JOIN admin a ON e.aid=a.id WHERE e.id=#{id}

SELECT tablea.eid eid, tablea.num num, tablea.password password, tablea.esalt esalt, tablea.`ename` ename, tablea.sex sex, tablea.phone phone, tablea.student student, tablea.school school, tablea.company company, tablea.graduateDate graduateDate, tablea.province province, tablea.seat_provid seat_provid, tablea.begintime begintime, tablea.endtime endtime, tablea.noticeTime noticeTime, tablea.flag flag, tablea.memo memo, tablea.eaid eaid, tablea.esummaryflag esummaryflag, tablea.aid aid, tablea.arealname arealname, tableb.uname uname from( SELECT e.id eid, num, password, e.salt esalt, e.`name` ename, sex, phone, student, school, company, graduateDate, province, seat_provid, begintime, endtime, noticeTime, flag, memo, e.aid eaid, e.summaryflag esummaryflag, a.id aid, a.realname arealname FROM experience e LEFT JOIN admin a ON e.aid=a.id) tablea LEFT JOIN (SELECT m.eid meid, u.name uname from member m,user u WHERE m.uid=u.id) tableb ON tablea.eid=tableb.meid ORDER BY num desc
select id,name from experience GROUP BY num

SELECT tablea.eid eid, tablea.num num, tablea.password password, tablea.esalt esalt, tablea.`ename` ename, tablea.sex sex, tablea.phone phone, tablea.student student, tablea.school school, tablea.company company, tablea.graduateDate graduateDate, tablea.province province, tablea.seat_provid seat_provid, tablea.begintime begintime, tablea.endtime endtime, tablea.noticeTime noticeTime, tablea.flag flag, tablea.memo memo, tablea.eaid eaid, tablea.esummaryflag esummaryflag, tablea.aid aid, tablea.arealname arealname, tableb.uname uname from( SELECT e.id eid, num, password, e.salt esalt, e.`name` ename, sex, phone, student, school, company, graduateDate, province, seat_provid, begintime, endtime, noticeTime, flag, memo, e.aid eaid, e.summaryflag esummaryflag, a.id aid, a.realname arealname FROM experience e LEFT JOIN admin a ON e.aid=a.id WHERE e.flag=#{flag} and endTime is not null ) tablea LEFT JOIN (SELECT m.eid meid, u.name uname from member m,user u WHERE m.uid=u.id) tableb ON tablea.eid=tableb.meid ORDER BY num desc

SELECT tablea.eid eid, tablea.num num, tablea.password password, tablea.esalt esalt, tablea.`ename` ename, tablea.sex sex, tablea.phone phone, tablea.student student, tablea.school school, tablea.company company, tablea.graduateDate graduateDate, tablea.province province, tablea.seat_provid seat_provid, tablea.begintime begintime, tablea.endtime endtime, tablea.noticeTime noticeTime, tablea.flag flag, tablea.memo memo, tablea.eaid eaid, tablea.esummaryflag esummaryflag, tablea.aid aid, tablea.arealname arealname, tableb.uname uname from( SELECT e.id eid, num, password, e.salt esalt, e.`name` ename, sex, phone, student, school, company, graduateDate, province, seat_provid, begintime, endtime, noticeTime, flag, memo, e.aid eaid, e.summaryflag esummaryflag, a.id aid, a.realname arealname FROM experience e LEFT JOIN admin a ON e.aid=a.id WHERE endTime is null ) tablea LEFT JOIN (SELECT m.eid meid, u.name uname from member m,user u WHERE m.uid=u.id) tableb ON tablea.eid=tableb.meid ORDER BY num desc

SELECT e.id, e.num, e. name, e.qq, e.school, e.student, e.beginTime, e.endTime, e.flag, e.endTime, u.`name` AS uname, a.realname FROM experience AS e LEFT JOIN member AS m ON e.id = m.eid LEFT JOIN `user` AS u ON m.uid = u.id LEFT JOIN admin a ON a.id=e.aid WHERE 1=1
and e.flag=1
and ISNULL(e.endTime)
and e.flag=0 and e.endTime is not null
and e.flag=2
and e.qq LIKE #{qq}
and e.aid=#{aId}
ORDER BY e.id desc

SELECT m.id, u.name uname, m.name, m.sex, m.school, m.time, a.realname, p.firstamount, p.secondamount FROM member m LEFT JOIN user u ON u.id=m.uid LEFT JOIN admin a ON a.id=m.aid LEFT JOIN (SELECT A.mid ,SUM(case when p1.id-A.pid=0 then p1.amount else 0 end) as firstamount ,SUM(case when p1.id-A.pid=1 then p1.amount else 0 end) as secondamount from (select p0.mid,min(p0.id) as pid from period p0 GROUP BY p0.mid ) A left join period p1 on A.mid =p1.mid group by A.mid) AS p ON p.mid = m.id where YEAR (m.time) = #{years} AND MONTH (m.time) = #{month} ORDER BY m.time DESC
